items.sentence: What I meant to say was that you shouldn\'t do that.
Last Monday was a holiday, so the banks were closed.
Tom doesn\'t like it when Mary kisses him in public.
Tom doesn\'t like riding his motorcycle in the rain.
Tom doesn\'t like the fact that Mary is dating John.
Tom was so out of breath that he could hardly speak.
I thought you wouldn\'t be able to carry everything.
Tom and I are planning on going to Boston next fall.
Tom and Mary got married when they were both thirty.
If you want to learn the truth, sit down and listen.
